mapper.insert: insert into recipe(member_id, type_id, situation_id, ingredient_id, method_id, time_id, level_id, serving, recipe_img, recipe_name, recipe_order, recipe_ingredient) values(#{member_id},#{type_id},#{situation_id},#{ingredient_id}, #{method_id},#{time_id},#{level_id},#{serving},#{recipe_img}, #{recipe_name},#{recipe_order},#{recipe_ingredient});
